name: v2.9.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Initialize Accessor::Sparse members to default values by @DrQuackeroo in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/516
* Removed TINYGLTF_USE_CPP14 option since it is unused by @nepp95 in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/517

## New Contributors
* @DrQuackeroo made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/516
* @nepp95 made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/517

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.9.5...v2.9.6

name: v2.9.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Add bounds check to images loaded from bufferviews by @ctrlaltf2 in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/512

## New Contributors
* @ctrlaltf2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/512

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.9.4...v2.9.5

name: v2.9.4
body:
## What's Changed
* CMake: fix export install dir by @nim65s in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/503
* CMake: allow opt-out of installing vendored headers by @nim65s in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/504
* Documentation: Submodule hint added by @thearchivalone in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/507
* Added NO_FS definition for std::ofstream usage by @NoirMorilec in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/509

## New Contributors
* @nim65s made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/503
* @thearchivalone made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/507
* @NoirMorilec made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/509

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.9.3...v2.9.4

name: v2.9.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Allow WriteImageDataFunction() callback to be called with empty images by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/496
* Fix Animation extensions being loaded in place of Sampler extensions by @msklywenn in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/501

## New Contributors
* @msklywenn made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/501

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.9.2...v2.9.3

name: v2.9.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Properly clear the model before loading by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/493


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.9.1...v2.9.2

name: v2.9.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Make inverseBindMatrices optional by @danwillm in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/492

## New Contributors
* @danwillm made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/492

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.9.0...v2.9.1

name: v2.9.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Filesystem API has been changed.
* Fix images not being saved due to missing filesystem callbacks by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/491


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.23...v2.9.0

name: v2.8.23
body:
## What's Changed
* Update typedefs of C-style function pointers to std::function by @SeanCurtis-TRI in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/489

## New Contributors
* @SeanCurtis-TRI made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/489

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.22...v2.8.23

name: v2.8.22
body:
## What's Changed
* M_PI was not defined by <cmath> by @jam3sward in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/475
* Bug/msft lod extension used by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/480
* Added the pmode argument to _wopen to fix the access permission on MinGW by @The0Dev in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/479
* Fix C4267 warnings in Visual Studio on WIN32 by @jam3sward in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/481
* Fix C4018 warnings in MSVC on WIN32 by @jam3sward in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/482
* msvc 32bit: Fix C4244 warning by @bwrsandman in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/485
* Fix stripping of slashes from paths by @pmcgvr in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/486

## New Contributors
* @jam3sward made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/475
* @The0Dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/479
* @bwrsandman made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/485
* @pmcgvr made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/486

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.21...v2.8.22

name: v2.8.21
body:
## What's Changed
* [Feature] Add basic support for MSFT_lod extension by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/471


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.20...v2.8.21

name: v2.8.20
body: **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.19...v2.8.20

name: v2.8.19
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix Default constructed Material has wrong emissiveFactor #459 by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/460
* Fix Empty nodes are wrongly serialized as null Issue #457 by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/462
* Fix Light reference in the node issue #458 by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/463
* Fix Empty scenes are wrongly serialized as null Issue #464 by @ptc-tgamper in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/465
* Small security and overflow patch by @rhiskey in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/467

## New Contributors
* @ptc-tgamper made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/460
* @rhiskey made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/467

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.18...v2.8.19

name: v2.8.18
body:
## What's Changed
* Allow BufferView indices to be unspecified. by @haroonq in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/456

## New Contributors
* @haroonq made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/456

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.17...v2.8.18

name: v2.8.17
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix incorrect component type shown in warning message by @nyalldawson in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/455


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.16...v2.8.17

name: v2.8.16
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle the situation where the recorded component type does not match the required type for the actual number of stored points by @nyalldawson in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/447
* Always use size_t for byte offsets by @emimvi in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/449
* Add mingw msys2 workflow by @nyalldawson in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/451
* Fix msvc build -- STRICT is a msvc macro name by @nyalldawson in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/450
* Relax bin chunk end alignment check in permissive mode by @nyalldawson in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/452
* Fix build with draco by @nyalldawson in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/453

## New Contributors
* @emimvi made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/449

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.15...v2.8.16

name: v2.8.15
body:
Added SetParseStrictness() API to control parsing strictness of glTF(default = strict).
 
## What's Changed
* added project link to readme by @turanszkij in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/442
* Fix misleading error message by @nyalldawson in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/446
* Be tolerant when encountering emissiveFactor with array length 4 by @nyalldawson in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/445

## New Contributors
* @turanszkij made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/442
* @nyalldawson made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/446

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.14...v2.8.15

name: v2.8.14
body:
## What's Changed
* MinGW _wfopen_s fix by @RE-Kovalev in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/435
* Fix issue when serializing extensions of a primitive by @dimitri-tdg in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/436
* Modernize by @dyollb in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/433

## New Contributors
* @RE-Kovalev made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/435
* @dimitri-tdg made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/436
* @dyollb made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/433

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.13...v2.8.14

name: v2.8.13
body:
Fixed light and emitter in tinygltf::Node was not initialized. https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/issues/431

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.12...v2.8.13

name: v2.8.12
body:
## What's Changed
* KHR_lights_punctual: Serialize node light refs by @agnat in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/426
* (experimental) KHR_audio parsing support (ASCII only) by @AdamFull in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/429

## New Contributors
* @AdamFull made their first contribution in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/429

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.11...v2.8.12

name: v2.8.11
body:
## What's Changed
* get rid of std::function by @agnat in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/424
* KHR_lights_punctual: parse light source references from scene nodes by @agnat in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/423
* Add missing extras and extensions fields by @agnat in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/422


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.10...v2.8.11

name: v2.8.10
body:
Fix duplicated JSON keys when serializing lights with RapidJSON backend. https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/issues/420

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.9...v2.8.10

name: v2.8.9
body:
## What's Changed
* [Bugfix] Actually invoke the user-supplied function instead of subtracting from a pointer... by @agnat in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/418


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.8...v2.8.9

name: v2.8.8
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix to #416 by @syoyo in https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/pull/417
  * Fix reading a folder(in posix) which causes seg fault.
* Add feature to limit external file size when reading. 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/syoyo/tinygltf/compare/v2.8.7...v2.8.8
